including COPD and pulmonary hypertension. - **Hikka**: Hiccups; often seen in metabolic; cardiac conditions. - **Anidra**: Insomnia; sleep disturbances; linked to anxiety and sleep apnea. - **Atisara**: Excess mucus; seen in diabetes mellitus. - **Medhavi Prakruti**: Constitutionally prone to obesity and metabolic disorders. - **Pratishyaya**: Chronic nasal congestion; often associated with sleep apnea. - **Udara Roga**: Abdominal distension and digestive issues due to metabolic syndrome. - **Chardi**: Nausea; often seen in heart failure and metabolic disorders. - **Kaphaja Kasa**: Cough with mucus; seen in chronic bronchitis. - **Vataja Hikka**: Hiccups due to Vata imbalance. - **Kaphaja Shvasa**: Breathing difficulty due to Kapha accumulation in the lungs. - **Pittaja Hridaya Dushti**: Pitta-related heart dysfunction; contributing to angina and ischemia
